attributes.action: impliment a licence to carry a knife / multitool to protect responsible people from prosecution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To implement a cheap to administer Knife / edged implement license. 
For tradesmen and responsible people whom carry knifes and multitools as both part of their jobs and for the adhoc emergencies that multitools were developed for in the absence of a toolkit. 
This would remove excuses of non tradesmen and irresponsible persons for possession and enable harsher punishment for unlicensed possession.
